arts.ttl: CorSera: Milan with the overtaking operation as they face Parma
arts.sum: After four matches out, Christian Pulisic is back available for Milan and Massimiliano Allegri for the delicate trip to Parma. The American will not start, lacking full match fitness, but he could prove very useful during the game, especially if things do not go well for his team. Winning tonight is the only thing that […]

arts.ttl: Allegri chasing his 100th win with Milan – Parma fixture not easy
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri does not want to make the same mistakes this time, he does not want to repeat what happened against Cremonese and Pisa, especially since the trip to Parma cannot be mishandled. Winning the three points would not only allow Milan to prepare for the derby calmly, but also let them return to the […]

arts.ttl: CorSport: ‘Failure is forbidden’ – Milan must pass Parma test to give Allegri landmark win
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Massimiliano Allegri is looking for his 100th win as AC Milan head coach, but there is a lot more than just that at stake in Parma. As Corriere dello Sport report this morning, ‘failure is forbidden’ in Parma.
